snippet: Barry Landau, a presidential historian and author, pleaded guilty Tuesday to conspiring to steal historical documents.
abstract: Barry Landau, a presidential historian and author, pleads guilty Tuesday to conspiring to steal documents signed by historical figures from the Maryland Historical Society.
lead_paragraph: Barry Landau, a presidential historian and author, pleaded guilty Tuesday to conspiring to steal historical documents.

headline.main: Maryland: Guilty Plea in Document Theft
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Guilty Plea In Document Theft
